## Biography

I am a postdoctoral research fellow at the Federal University of São Paulo, where I focus on how circadian rhythms influence the health and disease balance. My goal is to specialise in analysing actigraphy data and using it to predict health outcomes. I also have experience working with wearable sleep technology.
